overview: The year 1997 is considered a milestone in German sports history. Jan Ullrich is the first and only German to win the Tour de France. But why is this race still fascinating? Despite today's knowledge, 23 years later. When spectators see Ullrich's start on stage 10, they still get goose bumps. A moral dilemma from today's perspective, because acclaimed heroes became insulted operas and liars.
title: Deutschland. (K)ein Sommermärchen
